duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide assessment, therapeutic intervention, and education for patients with chronic respiratory diseases.
Demonstrate knowledge of the respiratory therapy process when planning for and providing care to patients.
Assess individuals to prevent, detect, monitor, and manage disease and complications.
Provide therapeutic interventions to directly impact cardiopulmonary health as well as overall health status according to established goals and care plans.
Provide education to promote preventative care, self-management, enhanced cardiopulmonary health, and quality of life.
Incorporate leadership skills to direct respiratory care services throughout the organization; demonstrate effective communication with patients, families, and members of the health care team.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of Respiratory Therapy. Must possess the National Board of Respiratory Care certification (CRT) and hold a current Respiratory Therapy license in the state of Minnesota.
